entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:13 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with blizzard developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the evening then becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
